answers.answer: I am no doctor by any means.  You do mention they have run blood tests, but what kind?  This happened to my father and it turned out to be his blood sugar levels and he is Diabetic.Good luck and find another doctor and tell them you are not leaving without some answers.  Doctors are human and not gods by any means, they make mistakes just like you and I do.
Thanks so much for your reply.My blood sugar is 89 when they test it so they think it's ok. How did they test your father and what kind of Dr did he see?Still trying

Because he had heart problems they just started every blood test in the world and they pretty much found out right away.  He is doing fine right now, well he does have good and bad days just like the rest of us.  but it is most important to be persistant with your doctor and have them run all tests.  His primary doctor did all the testing.
Ask for an A1C Test for Diabetes.

question: I been to many (4) Drs an tell them after I eat and that could be anything even a glass of water I get this feeling of uncontrolable shakes that last for hours and my heart races. They thimk I"m crazy when I say that it's after I eat. I have every test for gastro and blood work done and no one has  an answer. What do you think?
title: feeling shaking feeling after I eat
